Text: ohh my god man i spent 2 dual layer dics and it did'nt work.All i did was burned it using image burn the write speed was 2.4x can some1 please help me

First xbox needs to be jtagged or flashed with iextreme ^^

And 2nd is always good to sweep the iso with abgx to make sure that all is ok ;).

Then it's best to record it with imgburn ;)

Hope it helps

So, I've downloaded it, burned it into a Dvd, when i put it in the xbox it looks like it'll work perfectly but when i run the game it says "The region code of this game is incorrect for this console", any tips?
Do you need to flash your drive?
If when u put the game on ur console it says that the region code is not correct, u have to download an NTSC version...

So with this download we dont need to use abgx360

Please help
just run the iso (the game) through abgx program make sure every thing is green (no errors) then burn it
